text: @realDonaldTrump Over 100,000 people have died from COVID-19 in the US due to YOUR lack of appropriate response. #GeorgeFloyd was MURDERED last week by a cop. Your response? Use tear gas & rubber bullets on innocent protesters. This is the absolute last time to be bragging about the economy.
